title: WTB: Cheap Cycle, Sov 460, or Sov Green Apple
author: Joshchisox08

posts.post_title: WTB: Cheap Cycle, Sov 460, or Sov Green Apple
posts.post_content:
You've heard it from the title. I don't yet own a Cycle or Sov 460, nor do I own a green apple Sov. 

Looking to get a cheapo. It can be graded poorly or raw, so long is the card is in tact and minimal paper loss. 

Almost any player will do as I've only got 180, so there's lots of cards I don't own. 

Looking to spend 30-45 range. Thanks for your time

Cheers,

Josh
